entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
